system.description:
Ability Score Increase: +1 to Intelligence and one other ability score.

Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Arcana, Insight, Investigation, Nature, or Religion.

Suggested Equipment (Cost: 45 gp): Scholar’s pack, incense

Feature: Occult Lingo. Because you have studied forbidden arts so thoroughly, you expertly use jargon and knowledge in a way to make others believe that you are involved in these illicit activities. You may always choose to use Arcana in place of Deception when you are trying to negotiate with or infiltrate cults or other, similar esoteric societies.

Adventures and Advancement. Once the people learn of your knowledge with dark and dangerous energies, they may approach you with rumors of cult activity or other sources of dark magic in the region. If you successfully stall or dispel a major cult or ritual, you may obtain the services of one seasoned sage. 

Occultist Connections

  1. The librarian who never questions your oddest requests
  2. A local fence who disposes of your less savory acquisitions
  3. Another member of your secret society, with whom you share a secret hand gesture
  4. A religious figure to whom you confess the worst of what you’ve done
  5. The raven that always seems to find you, no matter where you go
  6. The apothecary who gives you laudanum to help with the worst of the dreams
  7. The person you helped escape from a cult
  8. The local constable who’s always keeping an eye on your shady activities
  9. The voice that whispers nonsense on the edge of your consciousness
  10. The cult leader who always thwarts your efforts to track them down

Occultist Mementos

  1. An effigy taken from a crypt
  2. The symbol or seal of a long-forgotten god
  3. Incense that you burn to help clear your mind 
  4. Ritual robes that you only wear when the moon is right
  5. An ancient book in a language you cannot translate, no matter how hard you try
  6. A missive from your secret society
  7. A dagger found on an ancient altar that you never seem to berid of
  8. A vial full of a strange liquid with an eye floating inside
  9. A strange symbol scrawled on a piece of parchment that came to you in a dream
  10. A talisman you use to ward off evil spirits
